entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 50
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
